entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC

[DQC.US.0009.45] The value of Defined Benefit Plans, Estimated Future Employer Contributions in Current Fiscal Year, 400,000,000, should be less than or equal to Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Contributions in Current Fiscal Year, 63,000,000. The value of the remaining contribution for the year should be less than or equal to the expected contributions for the entire year.
The properties of this us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlansEstimatedFutureEmployerContributionsInCurrentFiscalYear fact are:
Period: 2014-01-01 to 2014-09-30 Dimensions: Unit: USD Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/93410/000009341014000049/cvx-20140930.xml 3218
